name: Horror at the Harpers
detailed_description:
Ever wonder what would happen if James Cameron set the bar just a little too low and then dared us to jump over it? Well, buckle up! ‘Horror at the Harpers’ is our first ever game, crafted with the same precision and care that a toddler uses to build a sandcastle during high tide.

Step into the haunting world of "Horror at the Harpers," where a father's desperate search for his missing daughter unravels a terrifying mystery. Tony Harper's life changed forever when his beloved daughter, Ellie, vanished without a trace. Left with nothing but the haunting echoes of her voice, Tony embarks on a journey into the paranormal, determined to uncover the truth behind her disappearance.

As Tony delves deeper into the spirit world, he discovers an unsettling connection with Ellie, but his quest to reunite with her leads him into the clutches of something far darker. Unbeknownst to Tony, his efforts to communicate with his lost daughter awaken a malevolent force, a demonic entity that feeds on fear and despair.

Will you be able to guide Tony through this nightmarish ordeal and help him find Ellie, or will you succumb to the darkness that threatens to consume him? "Horror at the Harpers" is a gripping horror experience that will test your nerves and keep you on the edge of your seat. Enter if you dare, but beware – the Harper household holds more than just memories; it harbors a darkness that refuses to let go.

name: Orcdom
detailed_description:
Orcdom is a strategy-based tower defense game that emphasizes simplicity and planning. The game draws inspiration from classic tower defense designs and contains very little randomness. You need to carefully plan and use certain tactics to succeed.

An interesting and strategical placement mechanics
Defense towers can be placed on the battlefield in any position without worrying about making mistakes, and collisions can be used to adjust your formation.

A Simple and Tense Experience

As an instant strategy game, it does not require complicated operations or reaction speed. Place miniature buildings and cast spells at the right time to resist the onslaught of orc hordes.

Each level lasts 5-10 minutes, and you can start a challenge at any time to advance the game progress. Every game session can accumulate achievements and unlock content.

name: Garden of Wandering Souls
detailed_description:
Garden of Wandering Souls is a tower defense game with rogue-lite elements where you strategize using a random set of cards and tiles to prevent lost souls from becoming truly lost.

Astarum is a place where departed souls linger before reaching their next destination. It is a beautiful and serene realm, but hidden dangers lurk within its maze-like paths. Lingering too long causes souls to lose their memories and identities gradually, and if they fully lose them, they will vanish. Charon is the title bestowed upon those who guide those wandering souls to their next resting place. They must dispatch Pyxs to escort and protect the souls through the perilous Astarum by absorbing the souls toward them.

Multiple Tactical Choices

Plan your resources well and strategize your defense with numerous available towers (Pyxs). While luck plays a part, in the end, your skill affects the results. Each stage can be approached in various ways, so look for the most effective one!

Thrilling Challenge with Roguelite Element

With randomly generated maps, each playthrough will feel like a brand-new game. Permadeath with progression adds more tension and excitement in every wave.

Features

  • Be the Compass for the Souls: As Charon, deploy Pyxs to draw in and shepherd lost souls, helping them find their way.
  • Maze-like Garden that Changes Frequently: Experience unique and unpredictable challenges with procedurally generated maps, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.
  • Guide the Vengeful Souls: Some souls will test your strategic and adaptability skills as they are tougher to guide than others.
  • Plan and Adapt Your Path and Pyxs: Plan your defense with a wide variety of towers (Pyxs), drawing from a deck of random cards.
  • Keep Your Hand: You can save your card for later use, giving you greater control over your strategy.
  • Failing is Not the End: Enjoy the excitement of permadeath combined with a rewarding progression system. Unlock new towers, abilities, and upgrades as you master the game.
  • Multiple Game Mode: After completing the main story, challenge yourself further with the Daily Challenge Mode.

name: The Exit Protocol
detailed_description:
You were exploring a abandoned hospital until you got trapped in a loop when using the elevators. Stay on the look out for anomalies. Made for single player and multiplayer 2-6 co-op. Can you make it to level 12?

CO-OP Multiplayer
The hospital is creepy on your own, team up with friends to try and help to remember your way out of the hospital together! Everyone must agree with the decision your group is willing to make when using the elevators. There are 2 elevators, one that confirms there is an anomaly and the other elevator will select no anomaly. Floor 0 will be the correct layout that you and your friends will need to remember. Anything above floor 0 may or may not have something wrong with the original surroundings. A wrong decision resets you back to floor 0. Test your communication skills with your friends. No VOIP is implemented, recommend other applications to communicate.

This is a memory based game. Take your time there is no timer.
Average playtime: 0.5 to 2 hours.

name: Spritz the Happy Onion
detailed_description:
Steven Spielberg once said, "I think the real indicator [that games have become a storytelling art form] will be when somebody confesses that they cried at level 17." Well your move, Steve!

Spritz the Happy Onion is a zesty, delicious throwback to momentum-based platformers of old, complete with run button. Except in this game, you can die as many times as you like. Though dying does lose you an expensive egg, which are important because...

A MONSTER HAS APPEARED IN THE SKY TO DEVOUR THE MOON. And only our little layered lancealot possesses a recipe for a cake that might ruin it's appetite.

Spritz can also hop off of background elements, (a feature so satisfying and natural and fun I'm not sure why I haven't seen it anywhere before,) and don magic hats to give him extra abilities like flight and invincibility.

I'm Googling it right now, and it seems like the moon is important for a lot of things like tides and satellites and night visibility. It's not just pretty! So it would be very prudent for you to help Spritz on his quest!

name: Eonheart
detailed_description:
Beneath Eonpolis, The Everlasting City, lies a long-forgotten secret. One that maintains the city as if it were magic, one that is meant to last forever, until one day.

Explore Eonheart, an enigmatic machine complex that sustains an entire city by itself, in this classic-style 2D Puzzle Platformer, and unearth lost secrets... and unseen terror.

A platformer where YOU get to decide the platforms!

Using a mysterious wrench found inside Eonheart, you can create various blocks, each with a unique ability and many interactions. Use them to your advantage to traverse halls of machinery, brave hazardous chambers, and discover the secrets of The Everlasting City!

Puzzle, with a side of action?

Over 100 chambers of Eonheart are full of enigmatic mechanisms waiting to be solved. Manipulate blocks and the environment and discover devious ways to traverse every nook and cranny!

However, not all challenges come in the same form. A hidden danger, unbeknownst to the people of Eonpolis, awaits you. Can you use your knowledge in the most critical situations and take down even the most terrifying foes?

Discover a place lost to history

Eonheart contains many unique areas, each with its unique environment, atmosphere, and mechanisms. From the machine-filled halls of Outer Hull to the searing hot conveyor lines of The Foundry, to the mysterious experimental Greenhouse, and beyond!

Secrets hidden from most eyes

Further secrets wait to be discovered off the beaten path. Whether behind the most obscure gates or unimaginable challenges, do you have what it takes to uncover them all and learn the whole story behind Eonheart?



Seems like nothing lasts forever, after all.

name: Diviner
detailed_description:
Enter a dark and vague world, with danger lurking behind every corner and horrific foes withering under the scorched Sun. You play as a Tethered, one of many born from clay and dirt with a weapon bound to your soul, and you must adapt, salvage and strengthen your destructive powers to slay all that stands in your way. With strategic turn based combat and a free roam dungeon crawl experience, every decision you make will pave the path forward.



  • Strategic and deep turn based grid based combat
  • Powerful builds and gear combinations using Binds to augment your Weapons on a turn by turn basis
  • Full 3D movement, capturing the feel and depth of old school dungeon crawlers with the modern convenience of controls in games today
  • A cruel but beautiful world with environmental story telling



In Diviner, you are only as strong as your understanding of your tools. Wield powerful Tethers, ranging from flintlock pistols to greatswords, and imbue them with ancient magic and techniques. Use Binds to enhance your weapons and switch weapons during combat to gain the advantage over your enemies. Rebuild and prolong the life of your weapons with the scraps of your defeated foe’s tethers, or upgrade your weapons to take on even deadlier adversaries.

name: Planet of Carrots
detailed_description:
In the whimsical world of Planet of Carrots, where the motto "Who seeks, finds!" rings true, players are immersed in an extraordinary adventure alongside a ravenous rabbit on a mission for sustenance. The game unfolds in a fantastical realm where gravity behaves unexpectedly, presenting our fluffy protagonist with a challenging yet thrilling quest: to leap across treacherous landscapes in pursuit of delicious carrots.

At the heart of the gameplay lies a hungry rabbit whose determination knows no bounds. With each bound, the rabbit defies the odds of gravity, propelled by an unwavering desire to satiate its hunger. The game world sprawls across numerous diverse lands, each teeming with its own set of obstacles and puzzles to overcome. From verdant meadows to rocky crags and beyond, every terrain offers a unique challenge that tests the player's skill and wit.

Central to the narrative is the struggle against an unusual gravitational force that adds an element of unpredictability to each jump and maneuver. Players must strategize and time their movements carefully, mastering the art of precision jumping to navigate through the game's increasingly intricate levels.

As players assist the endearing bunny in its quest for sustenance, they uncover the true essence of perseverance and reward. The rabbit, grateful for the aid rendered, promises to reciprocate in unexpected ways, offering tokens of appreciation and unforeseen surprises that enrich the gameplay experience.

In essence, Planet of Carrots is more than just a game—it's an immersive journey into a world where determination and resourcefulness reign supreme. Through its charming visuals, engaging gameplay mechanics, and a lovable protagonist, the game captivates players of all ages, encouraging them to embrace the mantra that with persistence and a little help, anything is achievable, even in the face of challenging circumstances.

name: XX Delicto Demo
detailed_description:
About The Demo

The demo will introduce you to Velocity's world and will give you a sense of XX Delicto's gameplay, as well as give you an opportunity to see whether or not your computer will handle the game on settings that you find satisfactory. It features two gameplay levels. a pared back upgrade system, and a "guest boss" whose defeat unlocks an outfit exclusive to the demo.

The Story

When ex-cop Velocity's cancer-riddled rebel girlfriend disappears she tears off across the Scorch, a stretch of toxic wasteland and favelas outside the American capital of Coastal Ohio.

Along the way she does battle with rampaging gangs of Lost Girls and her former colleagues in the ultra-violent COPD, before launching an all-out assault on the Rubin Complex where a garrison of pneumatic boffin kunoichi awaits.

Will Velocity rescue Tranquility before she falls foul of the Sisterhood of the Holy Entrepreneuriat's eugenists- and before her girlfriend's cancer has the chance to cancel the long-anticipated revolution?

Gameplay

Hack'n'slash shenanigans ensue, with Velocity attacking, specialing, projectiling, dashing, and blocking her way through 15 punishing levels and bosses! Powers will be upgraded, health bars will grow, and wardrobe items of varying quality and dubious taste will be unlocked!

So if you're ready for the challenge, fire up XX Delicto today and prepare for truly mind-blowing levels of cognitive dissonance!

Amazing Game Features

  • Beat XX Delicto in a night! (Or two if you're terrible at this sort of thing!) Beat it every night if that's your bag!
  • Deeply engaging story with an innovative "skip ahead" button!
  • Rogue(ultra)lite elements make nearly every run marginally different than the last!
  • Infinitely replayable if you like it and want to play it again- NOTHING WILL STOP YOU!
  • Power up Velocity with a manageable "skill shrub" (patent pending)!
  • No multiplayer "on the roadmap" to distract the dev from improving the actual game!
  • All downloadable content downloaded when you buy XX Delicto!

name: Chronicles of Zimoria
detailed_description:
Chronicles of Zimoria is an upcoming creature-catching game set in the enchanting world of Zimoria. Players will embark on an epic journey to explore many different diverse landscapes, collecting Metals by conquering various Battle Challenges throughout the land. As you traverse this vibrant world, you'll aim to complete your ZiPidea by documenting over 150 unique species of Zimon, creatures of many different shapes and sizes that live all across Zimoria. Along the way, you'll also confront the sinister and enigmatic Cult of the Marionette, who seek to restore the ancient evil of the Puppet Master and help his dominion over Zimoria once again like he did in the legends of old. Prepare to immerse yourself in this thrilling adventure and thwart the puppets evil plans to reclaim power.



Chronicles of Zimoria is played using a turn-based battle system.

  • Create a team using over 150 unique species of Zimon, defined by their elemental type(s), attacks, personality trait, and skills!
  • Master a Attack-Points attacks system where every Zimon's attack have a number of Attack Points that show how many times that attack can be used until replenished, so choose your attacks wisely!


Our story begins in the small village of Quietbrook where you're a home-schooled student training to be a amazing new Zimon Tamer and head off on your own wonderous adventure in Zimoria one day. A few days later, things change as your dad mysteriously disappears and a strange cult proves a threat to the whole of Zimoria as we know it. It's up to you to figure out what happened to your father and to put a stop to what this evil cult is planning.

  • Pursue on your adventure as the antagonist as you travel across nine environments each with their own villages and routes to explore. Each one with side quests and other hidden secrets to discover.
  • Explore Zimoria as a whole, everywhere from calm and peaceful meadows to the depths of the Shadow Realm.
  • Play a key role throughout a fun new RPG narrative, complete with plot twists, turns, and choices that change the story so that nothing is exactly as it seems...




  • Lillie: Lillie is your neighbor and close friend who helped your family adjust to the ways of becoming a new Zimon tamer. It's always been her dream to travel and explore all there is to discover in Zimoria on an adventure with her own Zimon partner. A sweet girl with a feisty and competitive spirit seeking to form the perfect Zimon team along side having fun!

  • Aiden: Lillie's older and overly protective brother. Aiden desires to create his own path to fame and be the very best Zimon tamer no matter the cost. He will do anything to protect his little sister even if it means putting himself in danger, especially if there are others there that may be there to witness him. He may seem like a rude person who is selfish and just gets in the way but he is really sweet when you get to know him and maybe he has his own reasons for acting this way...


We are thrilled to present Chronicles of Zimoria to you, a project that has been crafted with immense passion and dedication. This game is our love letter to the timeless classics of the RPG genre. Our aim was to preserve the essence of traditional creature catching gameplay while introducing fresh features, all wrapped in a beautifully modernized art style.

Thank you for giving Chronicles of Zimoria a try. We hope your experience is as delightful and rewarding as the adventure we had in creating it!

name: Dinosaur Running（恐龙快跑）
detailed_description:
Game Description

You have escaped from the cage where the dinosaur was imprisoned and are looking for a way to escape. At the same time, there is a Tyrannosaurus rex following you all the way out of the cage. You must find the right direction as soon as possible and keep moving forward. In the game, characters can jump and accelerate to cross obstacles and ravines. While escaping, they can pick up and unlock items to rescue trapped pterosaurs. In return, it will help you cross more complex terrains. The operation is very simple, but it greatly tests the player's quick reaction ability. It is more challenging to complete the level in one go.

Gameplay

The character is set to automatically run, and if you want to rush quickly, you can hold down the accelerator button and not release it. For wider obstacles, you need to jump while rushing.
Move the mouse to select the direction, and quickly adjust the direction for terrain with rapid turns.

Game character

The characters have three different skins: Forest Elves, Ice Elves, and Abyss Elves.

Stand against dark forces with a combat system that is challenging yet fair. Choose a God to dedicate your successful quests to and gain their unique blessings. When the Crater turns out to be far more dangerous than they expected, the new Order must band together to survive.

As the protagonist, you wake up each day within the oppressive confines of the city with a list of tasks to accomplish: deliver bread, meet the neighbors, and explore the eerie, narrow alleyways that seem to pulse with a life of their own. A physics sandbox voxel-based simulation game for you to mess with. Build world you can imagine and destroy anything you create.

You can build and destroy offline, or join the thousands of players who play online each day.

name: Tower Alchemist: Defend Khaldoria Demo
detailed_description:
Defend the kingdom of Khaldoria. Build powerful towers and harness the power of alchemy to combine your tower's abilities or weaken enemies. Prepare for the devious skills of your foes and achieve victory through strategy and precision.



Become part of our closed beta tests, contribute your own ideas to the development of Tower Alchemist: Defend Khaldoria and talk to the developers about the game and its future.

DEFEND, BUILD, CONQUER:


In Tower Alchemist: Defend Khaldoria, you will defend your kingdom from relentless enemy hordes. Use a variety of towers, each with unique abilities, to strategically counter your foes. Harness the power of alchemy to create powerful potions that enhance your towers or debilitate your enemies. Each decision matters as you build, upgrade, and deploy your defenses.

KEY FEATURES:


  • Strategic Tower Defense: Place and upgrade various towers to fend off waves of enemies.
  • Tactical Gameplay: Utilize different attack and armor types to counter your enemies' strengths and weaknesses.
  • Alchemy System: Collect ingredients and brew potions to enhance your towers and weaken enemies.
  • Epic Campaign: Follow the story of Milan or Sofia and discover the secrets of your aristocratic lineage.
  • Endless & Multiplayer Mode: Challenge yourself with unique, never-repeating levels. Play alone or with your friends!
  • Streamer Mode: Play with your viewers or your favorite streamer and make their life easy or provide them with a nearly impossible challenge.

ATTACK & ARMOR TYPES

  • Physical
  • Life
  • Death
  • Order
  • Chaos
  • Water
  • Fire

AN EPIC STORY OF MAGIC AND INTRIGUE:


You are the heir of the Vampire King Zadicus. As his time slowly comes to an end, you are gradually involved in the art of defending the king's lands. Your help is urgently needed, as the first hordes of enemies are attacking the kingdom. Discover the thrilling campaign centered around the rise and fall of your aristocratic family. Relive your past and shape the future of your own story.

ENDLESS CHALLENGES AWAIT: ALONE OR WITH YOUR FRIENDS


Play the endless mode that offers you unique and never-repeating levels. Earn new talents in various talent trees to strengthen your towers and experience an increasing difficulty level.

name: Neon Grid Defenders Demo
detailed_description:
Neon Grid Defenders is a tower defense game that gives you the freedom to expand the path however you want with as many splits as you want. Give any upgrade to any tower to mix and match builds and see what works best and create satisfying destruction combos with them. A time based difficulty curve will keep you on your toes and will test your strategy. After each run you will be able to unlock different progressions to make you stronger for the next one.


  • 45 Waves
  • 4 Bosses
  • 26 Enemies
  • 20 Unique Upgrades
  • 30 min to 1 hour per run
  • 10 Towers
  • Tower leveling and upgrading!




  • After surviving a wave you will select, from a choice of 3, a road tile and a game modification that will allow you to specialize your build.
  • Between every wave you will need to place that road tile and create a new spawn point or extend an existing one further away.
  • Spend your earned power from destroying enemies to build more towers or upgrade them. Adding upgrade to them is free as long as you have any left. You can replace upgrades for free but the one being replaced is destroyed. Likewise, when you sell a tower you lose all upgrades you've given to it.
  • The game difficulty progresses with time. Splitting the road makes the enemies spawn faster and allows you to go further in the game with lower difficulty. The higher the difficulty the more enemies come and more health they have.

Place Road

Add upgrades to towers




  • Difficult to start but easier as you unlock progression
  • Diversity of towers and upgrades and the freedom to mix and match them however you want
  • A lot of roguelite elements designed to spice up your runs but not make you lose them if you change your strategy
  • Minimalistic sci-fi theme with satisfying combos
  • As an optimization enthusiast expect the game to perform well!

detailed_description:
Hide, Seek, Survive.

Voodoom is a casual asymmetric horror game set in a sprawling, eerie mansion. Team up as voodoo dolls to explore, collect powerups, and seek revenge on the monster that cursed you. Or, lurk in the darkness as the giant monster, ready to strike and eliminate the dolls before they grow too powerful.

  • Character Customization - Personalize the look of your voodoo dolls with a variety of cosmetic options. Stand out in the darkness with unique appearances and outfits.

name: Back To Back
detailed_description:
In Back To Back not only do your choices in upgrades matter, but your teammates will affect you as well. You'll be set to face off against endless hordes of robotic opponents all while making sure your upgrades don't backfire against your entire team.

  • FIGHT BACK TO BACK

    How long will you be able to survive in 1-3 player co-op against endless hordes of robots? Will you be able to work together in order to survive?

  • HOLD YOUR GROUND

    The entire game takes place within a single screen. Everything that can be dangerous will be visible before attacking. No chance of getting sniped by an enemy that you never saw.

  • UNIQUE PLAYSTYLES

    With 4 different classes and 16 upgrades there's plenty of unique ways to play. Will you get in close to the enemy and trust your healing capabilities, or will you reinforce your position with your teammates in order to block every bullet?

  • PICK UP NEW GUNS

    Enemies will drop their weapons allowing you to upgrade your arsenal throughout each play-through. Each of the 7 unique weapons can quickly change the tide of battle.

  • UPGRADES GO BOTH WAYS

    Bullets hurt no matter who shot them. You'll have to dodge the same bullets you, or your teammates, fire at the enemies. Will you be able to handle the power of your upgrades without falling to them yourselves?

name: CAPTURED
detailed_description:
CAPTURED is an analog horror game where you capture anomalies on camera to escape what seems to be an endless hallway in your own home. Investigate mysterious phenomena, survive frightening entities, and reach the end of the hallway!


Explore a procedural generated endless hallway filled with unusual phenomena and ever-changing rooms. Caught in a never-ending loop, leaving the house only leads you right back into the same hallway. Plunged in complete darkness, room after room, your once-familiar home feels increasingly alien.




Break the loop by exercising your memory skills. Use your camera to zoom in on suspicious changes and select their anomaly type. Missing or incorrectly identifying any unusual phenomena within a loop will wipe your camera's memory. Correctly capture 13 anomalies to escape.




Watch out for unwanted company. While silence may be a good tactic, staying too long within a loop could give away your location. Use your flashlight, camera, and the doors strategically to survive each entity's unique mechanics.




Using a custom movement experience, step into a nostalgic late '90s aesthetic with realistic graphics, minimal UI, and a chilling atmosphere.



FEATURES

  • Experience isolation and the eerie feeling of being trapped in a looping house set in the late 90s.
  • Explore a procedurally generated hallway filled with a chilling atmosphere.
  • Use your camera to zoom in on anomalies and capture them.
  • Identify and classify captured anomalies, including Object, Electronic, Lighting, Water, Missing Room, and Deformed Room.
  • Survive encounters with three monsters, each with unique traits and mechanics.
  • Immerse yourself in an analog horror experience featuring realistic graphics, a VHS 90s aesthetic, a dynamic camera system, and immersive flashlight movement.

Slime has invaded the world, use 6 heroes to destroy the slimes and monsters! Break out of the siege and usher in victory!


Slime Coming is a pixel-art, cartoon-style light rogue-like, survivor-like game that uses fully automatic attacks and is simple to play.
You only need to operate the hero to move, collect magic stones and gold coins, then upgrade, choose skills, and combine multiple skills to get the best choice.
You can enhance your heroes with gold coins, and enhancement is common to all heroes.
The game does not have exaggerated and dazzling screen-wide light and shadow effects, and the performance of attack skills is also restrained and limited.

Japanese RPG fantasy style, experience the joy of barrage games!

The maximum level of skills of each character is different, so pay attention to the maximum level of skills.
The number of shuffles during strengthening is very important in the early stage.
The collection skill can absorb magic stones and gold coins from a distance. Generally, it is very strong at level 3-4.
In the early stage, you can look for treasure chests, which contain magic stones, gold coins and apples.
Trees and attackable objects can drop apples, which can sometimes save lives.
Only one skill or scene can be unlocked in each game. The condition for unlocking a skill is that a certain skill is upgraded to level 4 or above.

name: 放置仙途
detailed_description:
Overview

This is an idle game set in the world of cultivation, offering players a relaxing yet thrilling experience full of unknown adventures. In the game, you, a mere mortal, accidentally obtain a mysterious ring from the immortal realm. The ring’s spirit guides you on the path of cultivation, from Qi Refining to Foundation Establishment, and ultimately to ascension as a supreme immortal. Embark on your cultivation journey, challenge the limits, and explore endless possibilities!

Idle Gameplay

The game focuses on idle mechanics, requiring only simple mouse clicks for various operations such as planting spiritual herbs, refining elixirs, gathering minerals, and forging artifacts. Equip your elixirs and artifacts, and set out to challenge enemies, collecting rare drops along the way. The combat process is automated, allowing you to progress effortlessly. However, if you wish to increase efficiency, you can manually use items during battles.

Various Skills

Planting spiritual herbs, finding rare spirit insects, nurturing spirit insects, refining elixirs, collecting immortal wood and mineral veins, forging artifacts, drawing talismans, learning formations, and crafting formation tools—everything you can think of related to cultivation skills is available. Of course, the core of cultivation is to enhance your cultivation level. By practicing various skills, you can accelerate your own cultivation. Additionally, you can engage in body refining and spell training, enabling you to challenge higher-level enemies.
